results.title: Grave of the Fireflies
results.brief_description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned when their mother is killed during an air raid in Kobe, Japan. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, Seita and Setsuko struggle to survive.
results.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned when their mother is killed during an air raid in Kobe, Japan. After a falling out with their aunt, they move into an abandoned bomb shelter. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, Seita and Setsuko struggle to survive.
description_for_label: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned when their mother is killed during an air raid in Kobe, Japan. After a falling out with their aunt, they move into an abandoned bomb shelter. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, Seita and Setsuko struggle to survive.

results.title: Grass Roots
results.brief_description: Grass Roots is an Australian television series produced by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation between 2000 and 2003.The series is set around the fictional Arcadia Waters Council near Sydney, and was primarily a satirical look at the machinations of local government.

constellations_other.name: Bob Connolly
constellations_other.description: Australian audiences just can't seem to get enough of exploring local governments, bureaucracy and politics, whether that's through documentaries or biting social satire.

results.description:
Grass Roots is an Australian television series produced by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation between 2000 and 2003.

The series is set around the fictional Arcadia Waters Council near Sydney, and was primarily a satirical look at the machinations of local government. It was written by Geoffrey Atherden.

Part of the series was filmed in the inner west Sydney suburb of Concord. Many external shots of Arcadia waters Council chambers used Concord Council Chambers as a setting and as was other various locations around Concord, particularly in the shopping centre and cafes in Majors Bay Road. Beach scenes were filmed at Mona Vale, New South Wales on Sydney’s northern beaches, while the location “Cemetery Point” was filmed at the Mona Vale headland reserve.
description_for_label:
Grass Roots is an Australian television series produced by the Australian Broadcasting Corporation between 2000 and 2003.

The series is set around the fictional Arcadia Waters Council near Sydney, and was primarily a satirical look at the machinations of local government. It was written by Geoffrey Atherden.

Part of the series was filmed in the inner west Sydney suburb of Concord. Many external shots of Arcadia waters Council chambers used Concord Council Chambers as a setting and as was other various locations around Concord, particularly in the shopping centre and cafes in Majors Bay Road. Beach scenes were filmed at Mona Vale, New South Wales on Sydney’s northern beaches, while the location “Cemetery Point” was filmed at the Mona Vale headland reserve.

images.alt_text: A blue image of the DVD box set featuring faces of the cast

results.title: GoodFellas
results.brief_description: Considered to be one of Scorsese’s finest – and most disturbing – films, Goodfellas explores a world where mobsters ruled the roost, splashed the cash, controlled the cops and provided glamorous role models – before it comes crashing down.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

results.description:
Considered to be one of Scorsese’s finest – and most disturbing – films, Goodfellas sets out to explain the attraction mobsters held for impressionable young men in the 1950s. The mobsters ruled the roost, splashed the cash, controlled the cops and provided glamorous role models. Inevitably, though, this world of corruption, drugs and crime will collapse in an orgy of violence and destruction.

Crucially, the film – which is seen from the perspective of Henry Hill (brilliantly played by Ray Liotta) – explores the attraction of organised crime. As a child back in Brooklyn in the fifties, Henry parked cars for the flashy mobsters and admired them far more than the ‘straight’ guys who worked 9 to 5. “Being a gangster was better than being President of the United States”, he says. But of course it can’t last, not with drugs and violence leading to more violence, and not with wise guys like De Niro’s Jimmy and Joe Pesci’s volatile Tommy.

“What people don’t understand is that a gangster’s job is not to go around killing people. A gangster’s job is to make money.” Scorsese used these words to explain his decision to return to the world of Mean Streets with this nightmarish film version of Nicholas Pileggi’s Wiseguy, a book of factual reportage.

With its typically Scorsesian energy, its jet black humour, its colourful characters and its at times startling violence, Goodfellas is the Citizen Kane of gangster movies.
description_for_label:

The mobsters ruled the roost, splashed the cash, controlled the cops and provided glamorous role models. Inevitably, though, this world of corruption, drugs and crime will collapse in an orgy of violence and destruction.

Crucially, the film – which is seen from the perspective of Henry Hill (brilliantly played by Ray Liotta) – explores the attraction of organised crime. As a child back in Brooklyn in the fifties, Henry parked cars for the flashy mobsters and admired them far more than the ‘straight’ guys who worked 9 to 5. “Being a gangster was better than being President of the United States”, he says. But of course it can’t last, not with drugs and violence leading to more violence, and not with wise guys like De Niro’s Jimmy and Joe Pesci’s volatile Tommy.

“What people don’t understand is that a gangster’s job is not to go around killing people. A gangster’s job is to make money.” Scorsese used these words to explain his decision to return to the world of Mean Streets with this nightmarish film version of Nicholas Pileggi’s Wiseguy, a book of factual reportage.

With its typically Scorsesian energy, its jet black humour, its colourful characters and its at times startling violence, Goodfellas is the Citizen Kane of gangster movies.

results.title: Good Omens
results.brief_description: Aziraphale, an angel, and Crowley, a demon, join forces to find the Antichrist and stop Armageddon.

constellations_other.name: Judy and Punch and many more
constellations_other.description: Women have been oppressed by patriarchal conventions and by men under the guise of the supernatural throughout history, but recent moving-image works are reframing these historical persecutions.

results.description: Aziraphale, an angel, and Crowley, a demon, join forces to find the Antichrist and stop Armageddon.
description_for_label: Aziraphale, an angel, and Crowley, a demon, join forces to find the Antichrist and stop Armageddon.

results.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III, Roy Walker, Barry Levinson, Mark Johnson, Keith Denny, Mitch Markowitz and Larry Brezner
results.brief_description: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III, Roy Walker, Barry Levinson, Mark Johnson, Keith Denny, Mitch Markowitz and Larry Brezner
results.description: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson, with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer’s broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh, who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.
description_for_label: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson, with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer’s broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh, who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.

results.title: Gone with the Wind
results.creator_credit: Sidney Howard, George Cukor, John Van Druten, William Cameron Menzies, Victor Fleming, Ben Hecht, David O. Selznick, Elmer Ellsworth, Sam Wood, Jo Swerling, Oliver H.P. Garrett, Eugene Joseff, Selznick International Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Walter Plunkett
results.brief_description: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sidney Howard, George Cukor, John Van Druten, William Cameron Menzies, Victor Fleming, Ben Hecht, David O. Selznick, Elmer Ellsworth, Sam Wood, Jo Swerling, Oliver H.P. Garrett, Eugene Joseff, Selznick International Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Walter Plunkett
results.description: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.
description_for_label: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.

results.title: Gone Girl
results.brief_description: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.

results.description: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.
description_for_label: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.

results.title: Golden Slumbers
results.creator_credit: CinéCinéma, Vycky Films, Bophana Production, Araucania Films and Davy Chou
results.brief_description: In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns the loss of lives and culture at the hands of the Khmer Rouge, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.

constellations_other.name: Bophana: cultural memory on film
constellations_other.description: Bophana Audiovisual Resource Center is dedicated to the collection, preservation and presentation of audiovisual material related to Cambodia. Their collection includes archival footage, newsreels, documentaries, feature films, photographs and vinyl records.

results.creator_credit_for_label: CinéCinéma, Vycky Films, Bophana Production, Araucania Films and Davy Chou
results.description: Over three million Cambodians died in the genocide between 1975 and 1979. The Khmer Rouge’s reign of terror also decimated a homegrown film industry that had flourished since 1960: movie theaters were bombed, film prints were destroyed and artists were executed. In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns this loss of lives and culture, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.
description_for_label: Over three million Cambodians died in the genocide between 1975 and 1979. The Khmer Rouge’s reign of terror also decimated a homegrown film industry that had flourished since 1960: movie theaters were bombed, film prints were destroyed and artists were executed. In Golden Slumbers, French-Cambodian filmmaker Davy Chou mourns this loss of lives and culture, but balances the somber material with a playfulness that honors the lush melodramas and mythic adventures of the glory years.

results.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
results.brief_description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet clash in a spectacular battle for the ages.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet clash in a spectacular battle for the ages. As Monarch embarks on a perilous mission into uncharted terrain and unearths clues to the Titans’ origins, a human conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.
description_for_label: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet clash in a spectacular battle for the ages. As Monarch embarks on a perilous mission into uncharted terrain and unearths clues to the Titans’ origins, a human conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.

results.title: Glitter
results.brief_description: A young woman is catapulted into pop stardom, with her already-famous DJ boyfriend calling the shots.
results.description: A young woman is catapulted into pop stardom, with her already-famous DJ boyfriend calling the shots.
